column4: Something is always running find on my 10.04 ubuntu.   Using htop, I notice that it is looking for mp3, ogg, wav, etc.  Is there an easy way to find out what is running find all the time?
thanks but that tells me nothing new.  I know find is always running and looking for music files.  I just don't know why.  I'm not running any media players (except vlc occasionally).
